Articles.Content:
1. xenon engine probe...the maneuver planning does NOTHING.  pull one of the arrows and the delta v goes up by the graphic (conics) don't change

2. got three xenon probes in 120 degree seperated 1000km parking orbit.  had 0.06t/0.08t of xenon left (confirmed in JSON file).  after quitting game and then coming back later...all xenon fuel is gone.  EC in the fuel window also shows as 0 but the EC for the ship shows 205EC.

 

 

Edited March 4, 2023 by Rook116
add info
